DOC.brief_summary: Primary Hypotheses : Senofilcon A provide significantly less rotation subject recumbent position Filcon II 3 monthly . Etafilcon A provide significantly less rotation subject recumbent position Filcon II 3 1 1 day . Etafilcon A provide rotation subject recumbent position non-inferior nelfilcon A . A margin 5 degree use . Secondary Hypotheses : Senofilcon A significantly good monocular visual performance subject recumbent position Filcon II 3 monthly . Etafilcon A astigmatism significantly well monocular visual performance subject recumbent position Filcon II 3 1 day . Etafilcon A monocular visual performance subject recumbent position non-inferior nelfilcon A . A margin 0.05 LogMAR use .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Head Gaze Position Soft Toric Contact Lens Performance
DOC.criteria: Age range 1860 year . Read , understand , sign write Statement Informed Consent . Appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . Be exist soft contact lens wearer ( extend wear last 3 month , silicone hydrogel daily wear allow ) . Require visual correction eye ( monovision allow monofit ) . Have spherical contact lens requirement range 1.00 6.00D . Have astigmatism 0.75 2.00DC eye . Have ax astigmatism within +/10° follow available lens ax : 70° , 90° , 110° , 20° , 180° & 160° , i.e . 60120 , 1030 150180 . Monocular distance visual acuity correctable 6/9 good eye best spherocylindrical refraction . Have normal eye evidence ocular abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : ) Clear cornea ii ) No anterior segment disorder iii ) No clinically significant slit lamp finding ( i.e . edema , stain , scar , vascularization , infiltrate abnormal opacity ) iv ) No active ocular disease recent surgery Having wear rigid gas permeable ( RGP ) contact lenses within last 30 day polymethyl methacrylate ( PMMA ) contact lenses within last 3 month . Clinically significant corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , bulbar injection abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . Extended lens wear last 3 month . Any systemic topical medication investigator 's opinion affect ocular physiology contact lens performance . Any systemic disease affect ocular health . Abnormal lacrimal secretion . Keratoconus corneal irregularity . Pregnancy , lactate plan pregnancy time enrolment . Participation concurrent clinical trial . Any previous anterior ocular surgery . Subjects know infectious systemic disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) . Subjects know immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV positive ) . Subjects know diabetes . Employees family member Research site , Principal Investigator study team .
